todos.title: Without
todos.body: Who would you be without it?

todos.title: Affect
todos.body: How do you act when you believe it?

todos.title: Absolute Truth
todos.body: Can you absolutely know it's true?

todos.title: Question
todos.body: What is bothering you or causing you stress?

todos.title: Meaning
todos.body: So what does that mean or what does it make you feel you should do, be, act, behave'?
